document.discussion_title: Canada Confirms First Case of Sexually Transmitted Zika Virus-TheMapStories
document.topic_text: Canada Confirms First Case of Sexually Transmitted Zika Virus April 25, 2016 By WSJ.COM Share This Post Canadian health officials confirmed the first case of sexually transmitted Zika virus in the country, saying that the person is suspected to have contracted the virus from a sexual partner who had traveled to an affected country. Subscribe to our newsletter to receive breaking news by email. Signup More Stories About The Map stories is a news aggregator that, collects news from thousands of news sources all over the world and links news to its location and displays it interest or location wise.
